name: MeteoClicker!
description:
Are you ready to face the meteorite? Click as fast as possible to make different spaceships appear and help you get more points!

How many points will you be able to get?

MeteoClicker! is a clicker developed with Defold.  

This is a university project developed by 2 Developers:

  • Andrea Raya Martínez, @andrew_raaya (Lead Artist)
  • Sergi Monreal Ibañez, @monreal_sergi (Lead Programmer)
  • Song by F-777- "Space Battle"

Hope you enjoy it!
